item.description:
Catch A Healthy Habit Cafe (CAHHC) will have another Psychic Fair from 2 p.m. to 6 p.m.

Each 20 minute reading will cost $20.00.

1)

Andrew Neblett:

In addition to being a gifted Tarot reader, Andrew is a Certified Registered
Hypnotherapist and Natural Health Consultant. Learn more at

http://www.neblettonl...

www.neblettonline.com .

2)

Debbie Atwood:

A former Wall Street Trader, she is a
Reiki Healer/Intuitive reader, she utilizes the Tarot of The
Moon Garden deck as well as regular playing cards. As a young
adult, Debbie worked closely for several years as a student
with renowned Psychic Medium Ruth Burnett, most famous for her
work with local police departments. She has studied with
members of the Micmaq Tribe, Big Cove New Brunswick CA., as
well as some Lakota Influence. Her native name is Mistydawn.

3)

Sharon Warner

Pet Psychic

http://www.communicat...

www.communicatorforyou.com/

Animal Communicator

Sharon Warner

(203) 265-1234

smeowarner@gmail.com

Sharon will need a photo or description of the pet(s) &
you can also supply her with a list of questions.
She will work with your animal companion from her office,
while your pet remains in the security & comfort of her or his own home.

http://www.bodymindsp...

www.bodymindspiritdirectory.org/CT.html

4)

"Star"

Priscilla Bock

Angel Reader

5)

Lisa Marie

Medium & Tarot

http://www.talismanct...

www.talismanct.com/


6)

Lilly Siegl

Angel Readings


This is a tentative listing of Psychics.
There is the possibility that something might come up to
Cause one or more Psychics not to be able to make this date.

Being from West Haven,
I am aware of the parking
Problems on Campbell Avenue.
I am also aware of parking areas
That others might not be aware of or use.
Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind
Glen's store.

On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to Marc Anthony's Pizza Italian Restaurant

There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony's.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Glen's store.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.
There is an alley between the buildings.
On Campbell Avenue, I turn left.
Glen's store is a few stores in.

This is a children friendly event.
You can bring your children if you want to.

While you are here, you can also order a salad, smoothie or
One of the other selections at Catch A Healthy Habit.

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabitcafe.blogspot.com/

I will send reminder memos and any updates
closer to the Meet Up date.

8/27/09

Please note that Lori of LAMN had personal issues come up and had to
Split town to move down south.
I will contact Glen either today or tomorrow to see if this
Event is still on. I will be the host and POC.
More information coming.

8/28/09

I did not get any response to my phone and e-mail inquiries.

As far as I am concerned the Meet Up is still on as planned.

I will be going to Look at Me Now/Catch a Healthy Habit on Saturday
afternoon.

As usual, I will make it up as I go along.

Please come on down for psychics, healthy food and
Enjoyable conversation.

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the Point Of Contact for this event. Most there can point me out.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Attends the Look at Me Now Psychic Fair on 8/29
